trans-unit.source: Defines a point associated with a set of workflow status events that are tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto associado um conjunto de eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho que são controlados no caminho potenciais execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Sempre que o estado da instância do fluxo de trabalho é alterado, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de estado do fluxo de trabalho baseado do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores para o infraestrutura de controlo de tempo de execução.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: A WorkflowTrackPoint defines an interest in all the points during the execution of a workflow instance at which specific types of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Um WorkflowTrackPoint define um interesse em todos os pontos de durante a execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho no qual ocorrem tipos específicos de eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You can add a WorkflowTrackPoint to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when a specified set of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um WorkflowTrackPoint para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para instruir a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo quando ocorrer um conjunto especificado de eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A WorkflowTrackPoint may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um WorkflowTrackPoint pode corresponder a vários pontos de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> with an appropriately configured <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to specify the types of workflow status events that the runtime tracking infrastructure uses to match the WorkflowTrackPoint.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>com um adequadamente configurado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation>para especificar os tipos de eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho que utiliza a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para fazer corresponder o WorkflowTrackPoint.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point that should be sent by the runtime tracking infrastructure when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>para especificar informações adicionais associadas com o ponto de registo que deve ser enviado pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> is initialized with no annotations and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>É inicializado com nenhuma anotações e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: You must set a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Tem de definir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>para o ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associados com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: You can add to Annotations to specify annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> sent to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar anotações para especificar anotações devem ser devolvidos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>enviados para o serviço de controlo quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Annotations are strings that you define that contain information to associate with the track point.
trans-unit.target: As anotações são cadeias que definir que contêm informações para associar o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma anotação pode conter informações sobre o caminho de execução possíveis o fluxo de trabalho pode demorar a partir deste ponto de registo ou pode conter informações a apresentar numa interface de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"> </xref> que contém as anotações associadas com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection; it specifies that no annotations are to be associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia; Especifica que não anotações estão a ser associado ao ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"></xref> that specifies the workflow status events that should be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"> </xref> que especifica os eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho que devem ser correspondidos pelo runtime infraestrutura para o ponto de registo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: You must set a MatchingLocation for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Tem de definir um MatchingLocation para o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: The MatchingLocation specifies one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that are used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match the track point.
trans-unit.target: O MatchingLocation Especifica um ou mais <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores que são utilizados pelo runtime controlo infraestrutura para fazer corresponder o ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"></xref> that specified the workflow status events that should be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure for the track point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"> </xref> especificado que os eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho que devem ser correspondidos pelo runtime infraestrutura para o ponto de registo de controlo.
